mapper.select:
select
from baoxian_underwriting_report where baoxian_underwriting_id = #{baoxianUnderwritingId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by create_time desc limit 0,1
select count(*) from baoxian_underwriting_report where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and status = 1 and pay_status=1 and user_type = #{userType,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT a.date,count(*) total from (select DATE_FORMAT(t.create_time,"%Y%m%d") date,t.id from baoxian_underwriting_report r LEFT JOIN baoxian_intent t on r.baoxian_intent_id=t.id where r.user_type = #{userType,jdbcType=INTEGER} and
r.city_code = #{cityCode,jdbcType=INTEGER} and
r.pay_status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
t.create_time> #{startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}> t.create_time
GROUP BY date,t.user_id, t.user_type
GROUP BY t.id ) a GROUP BY date
mapper.update:
update baoxian_underwriting_report
baoxian_underwriting_id = #{baoxianUnderwritingId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
baoxian_company_name = #{baoxianCompanyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
baoxian_company_code = #{baoxianCompanyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

zrx_price = #{zrxPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

szx_bjmp_price = #{szxBjmpPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

ckx_bjmp_price = #{ckxBjmpPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
dqx_bjmp_price = #{dqxBjmpPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
blx_bjmp_price = #{blxBjmpPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
hfx_bjmp_price = #{hfxBjmpPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ssx_bjmp_price = #{ssxBjmpPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
zrx_bjmp_price = #{zrxBjmpPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
orders_time = #{ordersTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
orders_num = #{ordersNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
total_price = #{totalPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
message = #{message,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
city_code = #{cityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
city_name = #{cityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
expire_time = #{expireTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
syx_policy_no = #{syxPolicyNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
jqx_policy_no = #{jqxPolicyNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
vehicle_model_price = #{vehicleModelPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER},
vehicle_model_code = #{vehicleModelCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
vehicle_model_name = #{vehicleModelName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
policy_no = #{policyNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pay_status = #{payStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pay_time = #{payTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
operator_id = #{operatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
operator_name = #{operatorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
operator_time = #{operatorTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_type = #{userType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
enable_order = #{enableOrder,jdbcType=BIT},
baoxian_insure_info_id = #{baoxianInsureInfoId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
policy_status = #{policyStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
jqx_start_date = #{jqxStartDate,jdbcType=DATE},
syx_start_date = #{syxStartDate,jdbcType=DATE},

sjzrx_price = #{sjzrxPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
sjzrx_bjmp_price = #{sjzrxBjmpPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update baoxian_underwriting_report set status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, orders_num = #{ordersNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, orders_time = #{ordersTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, pay_status = #{payStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and user_type = #{userType,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update baoxian_underwriting_report set policy_status = #{policyStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pay_status = #{payStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and pay_status != 1

update baoxian_underwriting_report set policy_status = #{policyStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
expire_time = #{expireTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
syx_policy_no = #{syxPolicyNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
jqx_policy_no = #{jqxPolicyNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
underwriting_status = #{underwritingStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
update baoxian_underwriting_report set syx_prop_num = #{syxPolicyNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, jqx_prop_num = #{jqxPolicyNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and channel='yangguang'
update baoxian_underwriting_report set policy_no = #{policyNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
update baoxian_underwriting_report set baoxian_insure_info_id = #{baoxianInsureInfoId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
